23  public final class snapshot_jsp extends org.apache.jasper.runtime.HttpJspBase
24      implements org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspSourceDependent {
25  
26    private static final JspFactory _jspxFactory = JspFactory.getDefaultFactory();

33      return _jspx_dependants;

36    public void _jspService(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
37          throws java.io.IOException, ServletException {
38  
39      PageContext pageContext = null;
40      HttpSession session = null;
41      ServletContext application = null;
42      ServletConfig config = null;
43      JspWriter out = null;
44      Object page = this;
45      JspWriter _jspx_out = null;
46      PageContext _jspx_page_context = null;
47  
48      try {
49        response.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");
50        pageContext = _jspxFactory.getPageContext(this, request, response,
51        			null, true, 8192, true);
52        _jspx_page_context = pageContext;
53        application = pageContext.getServletContext();
54        config = pageContext.getServletConfig();
55        session = pageContext.getSession();
56        out = pageContext.getOut();
57        _jspx_out = out;
58        _jspx_resourceInjector = (org.apache.jasper.runtime.ResourceInjector) application.getAttribute("com.sun.appserv.jsp.resource.injector");
59  
60        out.write('\n');
61  
62    HMaster master = (HMaster)getServletContext().getAttribute(HMaster.MASTER);
63    Configuration conf = master.getConfiguration();
64    HBaseAdmin hbadmin = new HBaseAdmin(conf);
65    boolean readOnly = conf.getBoolean("hbase.master.ui.readonly", false);
66    String snapshotName = request.getParameter("name");
67    SnapshotDescription snapshot = null;
68    SnapshotInfo.SnapshotStats stats = null;
69    for (SnapshotDescription snapshotDesc: hbadmin.listSnapshots()) {
70      if (snapshotName.equals(snapshotDesc.getName())) {
71        snapshot = snapshotDesc;
72        stats = SnapshotInfo.getSnapshotStats(conf, snapshot);
73        break;
74      }
75    }
76  
77    String action = request.getParameter("action");
78    String cloneName = request.getParameter("cloneName");
79    boolean isActionResultPage = (!readOnly && action != null);
80  
81        out.write("\n\n<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" ?>\n<!-- Commenting out DOCTYPE so our blue outline shows on hadoop 0.20.205.0, etc.\n     See tail of HBASE-2110 for explaination.\n<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN\"\n  \"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd\">\n-->\n<html xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\">\n<head><meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html;charset=UTF-8\"/>\n<link rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"text/css\" href=\"/static/hbase.css\" />\n");
82   if (isActionResultPage) { 
83        out.write("\n  <title>HBase Master: ");
84        out.print( master.getServerName() );
85        out.write("</title>\n  <meta http-equiv=\"refresh\" content=\"5,javascript:history.back()\" />\n");
86   } else { 
87        out.write("\n  <title>Snapshot: ");
88        out.print( snapshotName );
89        out.write("</title>\n");
90   } 
91        out.write("\n</head>\n<body>\n<a id=\"logo\" href=\"http://wiki.apache.org/lucene-hadoop/Hbase\"><img src=\"/static/hbase_logo.png\" alt=\"HBase Logo\" title=\"HBase Logo\" /></a>\n");
92   if (isActionResultPage) { 
93        out.write("\n  <h1>Snapshot action request...</h1>\n");
94  
95    if (action.equals("restore")) {
96      hbadmin.restoreSnapshot(snapshotName);
97      
98        out.write(" Restore Snapshot request accepted. ");
99  
100   } else if (action.equals("clone")) {
101     if (cloneName != null && cloneName.length() > 0) {
102       hbadmin.cloneSnapshot(snapshotName, cloneName);
103       
104       out.write(" Clone from Snapshot request accepted. ");
105 
106     } else {
107       
108       out.write(" Clone from Snapshot request failed, No table name specified. ");
109 
110     }
111   }
112 
113       out.write("\n  <p>Go <a href=\"javascript:history.back()\">Back</a>, or wait for the redirect.\n</div>\n");
114  } else if (snapshot == null) { 
115       out.write("\n  <h1>Snapshot \"");
116       out.print( snapshotName );
117       out.write("\" does not exists</h1>\n  <p id=\"links_menu\"><a href=\"/master.jsp\">Master</a>, <a href=\"/logs/\">Local logs</a>, <a href=\"/stacks\">Thread Dump</a>, <a href=\"/logLevel\">Log Level</a></p>\n<hr id=\"head_rule\" />\n  <p>Go <a href=\"javascript:history.back()\">Back</a>, or wait for the redirect.\n");
118  } else { 
119       out.write("\n  <h1>Snapshot: ");
120       out.print( snapshotName );
121       out.write("</h1>\n  <p id=\"links_menu\"><a href=\"/master.jsp\">Master</a>, <a href=\"/logs/\">Local logs</a>, <a href=\"/stacks\">Thread Dump</a>, <a href=\"/logLevel\">Log Level</a></p>\n  <hr id=\"head_rule\" />\n  <h2>Snapshot Attributes</h2>\n  <table class=\"table\" width=\"90%\" >\n    <tr>\n        <th>Table</th>\n        <th>Creation Time</th>\n        <th>Type</th>\n        <th>Format Version</th>\n        <th>State</th>\n    </tr>\n    <tr>\n        <td><a href=\"table.jsp?name=");
122       out.print( snapshot.getTable() );
123       out.write('"');
124       out.write('>');
125       out.print( snapshot.getTable() );
126       out.write("</a></td>\n        <td>");
127       out.print( new Date(snapshot.getCreationTime()) );
128       out.write("</td>\n        <td>");
129       out.print( snapshot.getType() );
130       out.write("</td>\n        <td>");
131       out.print( snapshot.getVersion() );
132       out.write("</td>\n        ");
133  if (stats.isSnapshotCorrupted()) { 
134       out.write("\n          <td style=\"font-weight: bold; color: #dd0000;\">CORRUPTED</td>\n        ");
135  } else { 
136       out.write("\n          <td>ok</td>\n        ");
137  } 
138       out.write("\n    </tr>\n  </table>\n  <p>\n    ");
139       out.print( stats.getStoreFilesCount() );
140       out.write(" HFiles (");
141       out.print( stats.getArchivedStoreFilesCount() );
142       out.write(" in archive),\n    total size ");
143       out.print( StringUtils.humanReadableInt(stats.getStoreFilesSize()) );
144       out.write("\n    (");
145       out.print( stats.getSharedStoreFilePercentage() );
146       out.write("&#37;\n    ");
147       out.print( StringUtils.humanReadableInt(stats.getSharedStoreFilesSize()) );
148       out.write(" shared with the source\n    table)\n  </p>\n  <p>\n    ");
149       out.print( stats.getLogsCount() );
150       out.write(" Logs, total size\n    ");
151       out.print( StringUtils.humanReadableInt(stats.getLogsSize()) );
152       out.write("\n  </p>\n  ");
153  if (stats.isSnapshotCorrupted()) { 
154       out.write("\n    <h3>CORRUPTED Snapshot</h3>\n    <p>\n      ");
155       out.print( stats.getMissingStoreFilesCount() );
156       out.write(" hfile(s) and\n      ");
157       out.print( stats.getMissingLogsCount() );
158       out.write(" log(s) missing.\n    <p>\n  ");
159  } 
160       out.write('\n');
161 
162   } // end else
163 
164 HConnectionManager.deleteConnection(hbadmin.getConfiguration());
165 
166       out.write("\n\n\n");
167  if (!readOnly && action == null && snapshot != null) { 
168       out.write("\n<p><hr><p>\nActions:\n<p>\n<center>\n<table style=\"border-style: none\" width=\"90%\">\n<tr>\n  <form method=\"get\">\n  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"action\" value=\"clone\">\n  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"name\" value=\"");
169       out.print( snapshotName );
170       out.write("\">\n  <td style=\"border-style: none; text-align: center\">\n      <input style=\"font-size: 12pt; width: 10em\" type=\"submit\" value=\"Clone\" class=\"btn\"></td>\n  <td style=\"border-style: none\" width=\"5%\">&nbsp;</td>\n  <td style=\"border-style: none\">New Table Name (clone):<input type=\"text\" name=\"cloneName\" size=\"40\"></td>\n  <td style=\"border-style: none\">\n    This action will create a new table by cloning the snapshot content.\n    There are no copies of data involved.\n    And writing on the newly created table will not influence the snapshot data.\n  </td>\n  </form>\n</tr>\n<tr><td style=\"border-style: none\" colspan=\"4\">&nbsp;</td></tr>\n<tr>\n  <form method=\"get\">\n  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"action\" value=\"restore\">\n  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"name\" value=\"");
171       out.print( snapshotName );
172       out.write("\">\n  <td style=\"border-style: none; text-align: center\">\n      <input style=\"font-size: 12pt; width: 10em\" type=\"submit\" value=\"Restore\" class=\"btn\"></td>\n  <td style=\"border-style: none\" width=\"5%\">&nbsp;</td>\n  <td style=\"border-style: none\">&nbsp;</td>\n  <td style=\"border-style: none\">Restore a specified snapshot.\n  The restore will replace the content of the original table,\n  bringing back the content to the snapshot state.\n  The table must be disabled.</td>\n  </form>\n</tr>\n</table>\n</center>\n<p>\n</div>\n");
173  } 
174       out.write("\n</body>\n</html>\n");
175     } catch (Throwable t) {
176       if (!(t instanceof SkipPageException)){
177         out = _jspx_out;
178         if (out != null && out.getBufferSize() != 0)
179           out.clearBuffer();
180         if (_jspx_page_context != null) _jspx_page_context.handlePageException(t);
181       }
182     } finally {
183       _jspxFactory.releasePageContext(_jspx_page_context);
184     }
185   }
